events.name: Singapore Office 365 July Meetup
events.description: Join us for the Singapore Office 365 July meetup, we will discuss the latest update on Office 365 following Ignite conference.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22, Meeting Room

events.name: DevOps current, future and the past - where is DevOps going?
events.description: Hey! Each meetup we have two 15 minutes slots available for talks. Short talks about what bothers / amazes / confuses you about DevOps and related topics are very welcome and a good way to ignite each other. Just add a comment below to propose a topic. Agenda 19:00 Start – grab some great food from the buffet and enjoy a drink with others 19:15 Talk: My DevOps journey (using docker containers and the kubernetes container management system) – Loh Siu Yin 19:35 Break 19:50 Talk: DevOps Best Practices – Sergiu Bodiu 20:05 Break 20:15 Talk / Fishbowl: DevOps: A manifestation of ITIL? – Alvin Goh 21:00 End Food and drinks will be served.

events.name: July Meetup - two talks
events.description: Dear Ingenious Haskellers, Welcome another great opportunity to share our passion. On July the 1st, we will have two speakers: "Damas-Milner type system" - Paul Meng (shifted from June's meetup) "Homplexity - measuring Haskell code quality at large" - Michal J. Gajda http://github.com/mgajda/homplexity Please contact organizers if you want to talk! We are looking for new talks!
